topic: England's triumphant Rugby World Cup 2025 campaign, from quarterfinals to championship.
evaluation: The cluster provides a comprehensive and continuous narrative of the England Women's Rugby World Cup 2025 journey. Articles cover the group stage (vs Australia), quarter-final (vs Scotland), semi-final preview and live report (vs France), final previews (vs Canada, redemption, mainstream impact), live final report, match report (vs Canada), and post-final analysis. All articles are strictly relevant, chronological, and demonstrate clear developmental potential, allowing for a synthesizable story of England's path to becoming world champions. No articles were deemed noisy or irrelevant.
